sentence: yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubb'upagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya yassa sambādho bhavissati, so pakkamissatī'ti etad'eva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
